Texas Treat

Ingredients

  • 6 cups Rice Chex
  • 3 cups Cheerios
  • 2 cups pretzels
  • 2 cups salted peanuts
  • 1 12 oz. bag of M&M’s
  • 1½ lb. white chocolate or almond bark

Instructions

  1. Toss cereals, pretzels, peanuts and candy together.

  2. Melt white chocolate or almond bark using directions on bag.

  3. Toss with cereal mixture.

  4. Spread on wax paper until cool.

Desserts
